Name: dice_trigger_1
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 1 the enemy rolls.

Name: dice_trigger_2
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 2 the enemy rolls.

Name: dice_trigger_3
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 3 the enemy rolls.

Name: dice_trigger_4
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 4 the enemy rolls.

Name: dice_trigger_5
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 5 the enemy rolls.

Name: dice_trigger_6
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn for each 6 the enemy rolls.

Name: vanish
Script: When inflicted: if(getstatusself(~ncr_vanish~) > 0) { trace(~removing stack vanish~); var tw = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null|0.01|null); var s = new elements.Skill(~Against all odds_old~); s.script = ~  removestatusself(\~ncr_vanish\~|ALL); removestatusself(VANISH); inflictself(VANISH); ~; tw.onComplete(s.execute|[self|target]); tw.move(); } /*this won't cause an infinite 'when inflicted' loop because it needs ncr_vanish to be more than 0*/
